bilingual.target: 我们需要定义这个术语。
不要让你的失败定义你。
你能下定义一下什么是幸福吗？

bilingual.source: We need to define the scope of the study.
bilingual.target: 我们需要定义研究的广度。

bilingual.source: The dictionary will define the word for you.
bilingual.target: 词典会为你定义这个词。

bilingual.source: You can define a call-back in the code.
bilingual.target: 你可以在代码中定义一个回调。

bilingual.source: Years do not define a person's ability.
bilingual.target: 年岁并不能定义一个人的能力。

bilingual.source: The teacher asked us to define this word.
bilingual.target: 老师要求我们下定义这个词。

bilingual.source: Use thead to define the header of a table.
bilingual.target: 使用表格头部来定义表格的表头。

list.abstract: define是C语言中的宏定义命令，又分为无参宏定义和带参宏定义两种形式，定义形式分别为：#define 标识符 字符串、#define 宏名(形参表) 字符串。 define函数的作用是定义一个常量，使用简单宏定义可用宏代替一个在程序中经常使用的常量，既可以方便程序的修改，也可以提高程序的运行效率。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't define consciousness, because consciousness does not exist.
yingyinNormal.zh: 意识是无法被定义的，因为意识根本不存在。

yingyinNormal.en: Good. But people don't really know me yet. And Castro will try to define me. Yes. Before you define yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，但人们并不了解我，卡斯特罗会给我下定义。对，在你给自己下定义之前。

yingyinNormal.en: Well that depends on how you define winning. You're here, aren't you?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这要看你怎么定义“赢了”。至少你现在还能坐在这里，对吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Kip worked out the scientific equations that define the wormhole and sent them to Paul's animators back in London.
yingyinNormal.zh: 基普解出了定义虫洞的科学方程式并将它们发回位于伦敦的保罗的动画师。

yingyinNormal.en: Define friends. Do people invite her to things? I think people occasionally invited her to things. She just never comes. She keeps to herself a lot. She's quiet. I did see her eat lunch alone. On Thursday? Every day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 定义下怎样算朋友。同学们有邀请她参加什么活动吗？我想他们偶尔会邀她参加。但她从未去过。她常常自己一个人。她很安静。我看到她一个人独自吃午餐。在礼拜四？每一天。
我有个主意，说说怎么就算“成人”了。

yingyinNormal.en: Define "I might even like you more than 'like you."
yingyinNormal.zh: 解释一下“甚至可能比喜欢你还要喜欢你”。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm hoping to extract an algorithm to define their movement.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我希望能创造一条能够描述他们运动的运算法则。

yingyinNormal.en: I don't think you like the fact that I beat your test. Further more you have failed to define the purpose of the test.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想你这是公报私仇。何况你也没有达到这次考试的目的。

yingyinNormal.en: The seed that we plant in this man's mind will grow into an idea. This idea will define him. It may come to change everything about him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一旦在人的思想播种 便会发展为意念，此意念会左右他。可能会改变他的一生。

yingyinNormal.en: And when they got to a certain level of arousal which would define as like 80% arousal, the question, the same question start popping out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 当他们的兴奋状态达到够高的程度，大概是80%的程度时，同样的问题会再次出现。

yingyinNormal.en: I could not deprive you of the revelation of all that you can accomplish together, of a friendship that will define you both. In ways you cannot yet realize.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有些事需要你们一起去弄清楚比较好，那是你们之间的友谊，只是你自己无法发现。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Defining</highlight> what it means to be a good parent is undoubtedly very tricky.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 定义什么是好父母，无疑是非常棘手的。

examination_example.sentence: The concept of sustainable development has been <highlight>defined</highlight> as profitable.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 可持续发展的概念被定义为有利可图。

examination_example.sentence: They suggest beauty should not be <highlight>defined</highlight> by looks that end up impinging on health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们建议，美貌不应该以最终影响健康的外表来定义。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: state or describe exactly the nature, scope, or meaning of

examination_example.sentence: Even when the terms were <highlight>defined</highlight>, readers still felt the same lack of engagement as readers who read jargon that wasn't explained.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使当这些术语被定义时，读者仍然和阅读没有解释的行话的读者一样感到缺乏参与。

examination_example.sentence: It's noteworthy that it made no difference if the jargon terms were <highlight>defined</highlight> in the text.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 值得注意的是，即使在文本中阐明行话术语，也没有什么区别。

sense_info_list.en: mark out the boundary or limits of

examination_example.sentence: While there's an undoubted genetic basis to individual difference, it is wrong to think that socially <highlight>defined</highlight> groups can be genetically accounted for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然就个体差异有着毋庸置疑的基因基础，但认为社会界定的群体可以从基因上解释是错误的。

examination_example.sentence: You can't see it, smell it, or hear it, and people disagree on how precisely to <highlight>define</highlight> it, or where exactly it comes from.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你看不见它，闻不到它，听不到它，人们对如何准确定义它，或者它的确切来源存在分歧。

examination_example.sentence: Using scientific methods, some of them can <highlight>define</highlight> authorship with 85% accuracy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 使用科学的方法，其中一些可以以85%的准确率定义作者身份。

examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们这个永远联系在一起的世界里，无聊是一种难以定义的状态，它是一个富饶的OIE。

数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

sense_info_list.zh: 下定义; 阐明; 界定

examination_example.sentence: That helped <highlight>define</highlight> me: I always work hard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这有助于帮我阐明：我总是努力工作。

examination_example.sentence: In <highlight>defining</highlight> preposterous, he wrote: “A republican government in the hands of female is preposterous.”
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在定义不合理时，他写道："女性掌管共和政府是荒谬的。"

examination_example.sentence: Life is really a long lesson that you can't <highlight>define</highlight> a person's success by just one section of it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人生真的是一堂漫长的课，你不能只通过它的一部分来定义一个人的成功。
